story:
Update 4-12-12:

We've reached our goal, but we're not done yet!

Since we've started this campaign there's been hundreds of hours of work put into the course and it's starting to show, before we've even seen the money from this campaign! We're only just getting started.

Hole 14: Mowed and grass re-seeded and grown up. Notice Golden Gate Hill in the background, mowed and weeded for the first time! Go up and see the bridge!

Hole 15: The before shot was taken 2/7. The after was taken 3/30.

One of the new concrete pin locations to  prevent theft and make swapping pin positions easier. This also provides more protection and easier maintenance for the pin sleeves. This one features Arroyo's new Vortex target and is our practice basket!

...but, we're not done! 

With additional donations, we can finish Phase 1 ahead of schedule and start in on Phase 2 earlier than planned.

Highlights and first priorities of Phase 2:

-Building up the tier and wall on 18 between pin positions B and C.

-Stabilizing "The Stump" 11-B and building stairs to ease disc retrieval and save the stump from further damage.

-Continuing growing the grass and weedeating and other general landscaping duties. The entire front 9 is starting to sprout and needs extra care and attention to make sure we grow it into the finest manicured fairways this sport has seen.

 

 

Update 4-9-12:

The blog is active! Check out the updates at GGPDiscGolf.wordpress.com for the latest on what's going on daily at the course!

 

2012 Marks the 5th anniversary of the Golden Gate Park Disc Golf Course being in the ground.

While this is a milestone for the San Francisco Disc Golf Club, as well as the sport in general, we feel we can make this course even better in 2012.

Since the course was installed, the section of the park (Marx Meadow) has become safer and more popular. The course brings people from all walks of life, and of all skill levels, to enjoy the beauty and the comraderie that comes with being a part of a disc golfing community.

So, we need to improve our course. Our top 5 priorities are:

Preventing erosion and loss of plant life is an ongoing task which requires hours of labor and attention. To combat this natural walls and erosion barriers will be installed, composed of naturally downed branches and debris from the course itself.

Some Pin locations need a new concrete job to secure the baskets in the ground, most urgently 1A, 13B, 8B, 11B, 18C, and 14A

Some teepads and waiting areas are on slopes, so to prevent erosion from heavy foot traffic, the areas need to be built up and proper drainage installed.

Weed trimming/mowing on slopes to increase visibility in the rough and improve course flow/speed of play on weekends.

Growing grass on the fairways where heavy foot traffic and course use has reduced it to dirt.

 

There's Good News!

We have a small, but dedicated task force that vigilantly watches over our course and works hard to prepare it for our charter review later this year.

Spearheaded by Innova Touring Pro Patrick Brown, the team has already made great strides to enhance the quality and beauty of our beloved Golden Gate Park DGC.

The San Francisco Disc Golf Club has allocated  funds from membership dues to provide support in the form of raw materials and equipment for the ongoing work.

 

What we need:

Support through funding to keep the workers on the course full-time, providing for and serving the rapidly growing disc golf community in San Francisco and the greater Northern California region.

Through their tireless work and dedication, the Golden Gate Park Disc Golf Course will be the premiere free public course in the United States and the standard by which all other courses, private and public, will be judged in the future.

story:
My husband is my rock, the love of my life; always the optimistic and looking for ways to help others in need.  Now he needs help, and I feel so helpless that I am unable to provide it.

My husband was injured at work in 2011, and sought medical assistance.  Unfortunately, worker's compensation would not agree to send him to the right doctor.  They also refused to pay him benefits for being injured.  My husband tried to return to work to support us, but his injury is so severe that they sent him home with an order not to return until it was fixed.

Now, almost a year later, we are still fighting with insurance companies and worker's compensation to pay for the tests and treatment my husband needs to get back to his old self.  He is in so much pain every day - he can no longer sleep in our bed because he has to sit up, and he can't lift a gallon of milk.  There is something wrong with my husband, but something that I believe can be fixed.  I just don't have the money to pay for him to see a doctor to prove to the insurance companies and worker's compansion that something is wrong.  It is an incredibly frustrating situation, and I feel powerless.

We have a lawyer who is supposed to be helping us, but it is a very slow process and nothing seems to be happening.  Currently, we are in the process of losing our home.

This whole situation is devasating to us, because it could be fixed if only my husband could see a doctor.  The two of us are only 25 years old, but this has affected us in so many ways.  Our dreams of owning a home, starting a family, and helping rescue dogs have been dashed.

It is very hard to ask for help, but any help would be greatly appreciated.  Any donations will go to finding a doctor for my husband and getting his back and shoulder injury evaluated.  Any extra money raised will help us to get back on our feet - finding a new home and a new job for my husband.  If Joe can get his injury fixed, we can get back to our lives and return to helping others.

If you can't donate, it would be so wonderful if you could spread the word.  Any little bit helps!  

Thank you so much for taking the time to read.

story:
Why Amelia needs our help:

I have been friends with this wonderful person since high school in the 80's.  What she lacks in height (she's 5') she makes up for with her sweet disposition, her smile, words of encouragement, laughter, and great sense of humor. To know her is to love her.

In the summer of 2006, Amelia was diagnosed with Hepatitis C. Hep C is a virus that can damage your liver. In Amelia the virus has decided to stay and hang out. It's like the in-laws who won't leave your house after the holidays. Only this is much more serious.

Amelia received treatment with interferon, a drug that, in addition to its healing potential, also gave her some great side effects like flu-like symptoms, some memory/cognitive loss, and depression. 

Her last liver biopsy showed that the interferon wasn't helping her anymore and the side effects outweighed the option of continuing.

She is currently on an interferon sabbatical, waiting for a new drug. While she was receiving treatment, the American Liver Association helped pay for her treatments. 

Amelia's story doesn't end here...

A couple of weeks ago, while not sitting around feeling sorry for herself, Amelia saved one of her cats from running out of the house.  In doing so she broke her ankle on both sides (she likes to do things thoroughly). She broke the tibia and the fibula closest to her ankle and had ORIF (Open Reduction Internal Fixation) surgery to help her ankle heal. 

Her stitches will be removed this week.  She will be in a cast for 12 weeks and unable to put any weight on her foot during that time.  

In a relatively normal, every day life, this break would be annoying.  In Amelia's life with Hep C, no insurance, and no job, this is crushing. 

I am asking for funding to pay for Amelia's mounting medical bills - just for her ankle.

She is without insurance and currently can't get it because of her pre-existing condition.  Obamacare will eventually help her but not until the pre-existing condition rule goes into effect next year.

All of the money raised in this campaign will go directly to Amelia to pay her medical bills. 

If you can't afford to help at this time, please share this campaign with others.

story:
What is Palestine MMA?

PMMA is a non-profit organization aimed at contributing to the growth and development of Martial Arts and Olympic sports for the children in Palestine. With this mission, PMMA strives to positively affect social development, health and education for Palestinians. 

What is this Volunteer Challenge exactly and what are we trying to achieve?

PMMA is holding an international fundraising drive in which several teams of volunteers compete against one another in a spirit of friendship to support this great cause. The aim is to raise enough money to fund the opening of the Palestine MMA Gym in Ramallah this summer. There are teams in Abu Dhabi, Sydney, California, and us here in New Jersey! We are a very new and small team here in NJ and we hope to be fierce competitors -- Help us reach our goal and beyond.

How much do we need to raise? The target goal is to raise $5,000...

but WAIT! Don't run away just yet. $5,000 may sound like a large number and you may think your dollars won't count, but they will!! Every single dollar sincerely counts and brings us closer to funding that gym over in Palestine this summer. Just think.. a few seconds put aside to donate just $5 or $10 can contribute to a new gym all the way over in Palestine for children to learn Martial Arts!

We will be doing other fundraising events in NJ such as a benefits concert, bake sale, and lottery fundraising, so our target goal has been set at $3,000 on this site, but that doesn't mean we have to stop there! =]

Still can't contribute?

IT'S OK! You can help in other ways. Simply help us get the word out and make some noise! You can:

  • set a link on your social media page (facebook, twitter, etc…) directing your friends and family to our donations page
  • attend our benefits concert in May (keep your eyes out for more information)
  • send positive thoughts and wishes our way!
story_txt:
What is Palestine MMA?
PMMA is a non-profit organization aimed at contributing to the growth and development of Martial Arts and Olympic sports for the children in Palestine. With this mission, PMMA strives to positively affect social development, health and education for Palestinians. 
What is this Volunteer Challenge exactly and what are we trying to achieve?
PMMA is holding an international fundraising drive in which several teams of volunteers compete against one another in a spirit of friendship to support this great cause. The aim is to raise enough money to fund the opening of the Palestine MMA Gym in Ramallah this summer. There are teams in Abu Dhabi, Sydney, California, and us here in New Jersey! We are a very new and small team here in NJ and we hope to be fierce competitors -- Help us reach our goal and beyond.
How much do we need to raise? The target goal is to raise $5,000...
but WAIT! Don't run away just yet. $5,000 may sound like a large number and you may think your dollars won't count, but they will!! Every single dollar sincerely counts and brings us closer to funding that gym over in Palestine this summer. Just think.. a few seconds put aside to donate just $5 or $10 can contribute to a new gym all the way over in Palestine for children to learn Martial Arts!
We will be doing other fundraising events in NJ such as a benefits concert, bake sale, and lottery fundraising, so our target goal has been set at $3,000 on this site, but that doesn't mean we have to stop there! =]
Still can't contribute?
IT'S OK! You can help in other ways. Simply help us get the word out and make some noise! You can:

set a link on your social media page (facebook, twitter, etc…) directing your friends and family to our donations page
attend our benefits concert in May (keep your eyes out for more information)
send positive thoughts and wishes our way!

story:
Detox:


Blue Hawaiian Cleanse is the first colon cleanser on the market with the natural and beneficial properties of coconut oil.  Coconut oil is a known agent for anti-viral, anti-fungal, and anti-bacterial.  Blue Hawaiian cleanse is a propriety blend of the absolute fienst herbs available.  With coconut as one of the ingredients, our clients are seeing incredible results in detoxifying and cleansing their digestive systems.

We have completed all of the testing, production and warehousing of this supplement and it is ready to ship directly to you!

 

The Book:


The book title was born one day talking with one of my clients.  He asked me if I had ever  heard how Elvis Presley died and how he had massive amounts of waste matter in his colon.  The KING was very constipated and this was the cause of his untimely death (The actual autopsy report is in the book!).  I don't mean to brag, but had I been available to Elvis during his reign, "I Could Have Saved E.L.V.I.S.!"

As soon as I verified that he died from extreme constipation, I knew I had to educate the world about colon health.  70% of our immune system is in our colon.  We are only as happy and healthy as our colon is.  The average American consumes 70-80% processed foods in which our digestive system does not know how to break down naturally.  In return, the undigested matter gets lodged and stuck in the colon causing pain, bloating, constipation and toxic waste build up which can lead to illnesses and disease.

As a Indiegogo contributor, your copy of my book, "I Could Have Saved E.L.V.I.S." will come as a limited, signed edition!

I'm here to educate the world in a fun way with the book and share the Blue Hawaiian Cleanse so others can feel better.  Thanks for your pledge and I look forward to your good health.

-Paula S

P.S. I may not have saved Elvis but I may be able to save you.

story:
The Short Story:

Breath of My Heart Birth Place is a community-run birth center providing an walk-in prenatal care clinic, women's health, pregnancy, and birth services. We are staffed by midwives and our goal is serving families in the Espanola Valley. We are raising money to finish the renovation of a birth room at our office in Espanola, NM. Your donation will allow us to finish our renovations to provide a comfortable and safe place for women and families to welcome their new babies into this world. 

Who Are We?

     The team that is developing Breath of my heart Birth Place (BMH) is a group of midwives, community members, families, community activists, and educators. We have been working together to develop our vision for BMH through strategic planning for the past two years. We have reached a pivotal moment in our dream; we are building a birth room!  

     The project so far has been supported by thousands of volunteer hours spent on planning, meetings, community out-reach, needs assessment and building construction.    We have begun our office space renovation to provide a birth room for moms and families in the Valley. Your financial  support will allow us to complete the project and make the birth suite available by the end of the summer.  

     The birth suite will include a birth tub in comfortable space for moms and families who are planning their birth with midwives.  The plan has been developed by an architect, the walls have been moved, and the electrical and plumbing is underway.  While the renovation project has  received small grants from supporting individuals we need to raise another $4000.00 in order to finish and furnish the room.

Background and Intentions:

Breath of my heart birth place is a community driven project with the goal of providing solutions to the issues facing women families and their babies in the Espanola valley. Health disparities and poor birth outcomes persist in our community due to many complex factors.  Many of the causes of these issues are addressed in our walk-in perinatal care clinic, homebirth services, and (soon) birth center through the community and culurally based care that our midwives provide.   We see the results of the tough beginning for many of the kids in our community as they grow up and have many struggles.  The BMH group is passionate in our belief that our community will find solutions to problems and meet the needs of our children given the appropriate resources.
 

What We Need & What You Get:

  • We need $4000 to finish our renovations:
    • $200 to paint the walls
    • $1200 for a stackable washer/dryer
    • $500 for drywall, paste, and nails
    • $800 for a deep bathtub for waterbirths
    • $3000 for furniture including a trundle bed, shelving, comfy chair, changing table, and side tables.
    • $500 for beautiful sign in front of the clinic

You might notice that this adds up to more than our target amount but we are hoping to exceed our goal and cover even more costs

 

  • For your contribution:
    • We are offering tokens of our appreciation at every level of donation. We encourage you to take part in this.
    • All of our gifts are from local artists who are offering in-kind donations to support our fundraising effort. These artists work hard and could use a fundraising campaign themselves, however, we know that the more we give the more we get, and it is in this spirit that they are donating their art. 
      • Check out our artisits and support them if you're so moved: Rebekah Tarin, Rose Simpson, and Chona Homegrown
    • Supporting healthy families by supporting healthy birth gives you the satisfaction of knowing your contribution is impacting multiple generations of people in the Espanola Valley. 

 

The Impact

     Our community is majority Hispanic and Native American population. Access to quality birth and midwifery care is very limited. The midwifery model of care is proven to address birth outcomes in so many ways, including reducing c-section rate and rate of preterm birth.  Breath of My Heart Birth Place was born out of the efforts of community members recovering their internal knowingness of birth. The moment of birth, when the family is forming or reforming, is an incredible window of opportunity for family empowerment.  The addition of a new baby brings an openness to change and a dynamism to our families. We want to support families to capitalize on this moment of dynamic change by providing meaningful midwifery care in a birth center setting.

     There have been many communities that have benefitted from this model of community care in New Mexico and other parts of the United States.  We have learned from our sister projects and will continue to invite their wisdom to help guide our efforts and support our community. 

     New Mexico has a deep history and long roots of beautiful culture and spirituality, though we experience significant financial poverty we are rich in many other resources.  This combined with with an amazing high desert beautiful landscape have combined to earn New Mexico the title "land of enchantment".  We as a community are working hard to make better the issues that challenge our land and people. We believe that a healthy and empowered birth stregnthens parents and provides a strong start for our children.  This is our path to generational change; help us to provide these services that will impact families for generations. We truly appreciate your  support. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

  • We ask that you support outreach and information regarding reproductive health in your own communities.
  • Help us to lobby for legislation supporting homebirth and birth centers anywhere in the United States. 
  • Link to us on your Facebook page.
  • Email people that you think would like to support our efforts and invite them to view our campaign.

story:
FINAL NOTICE:

Unfortunately, our IndiGoGo campaign has failed, but our App has not! So please visit our website: http://teenagetracker.net or Google Play Store and try our app.

 

We would love you to try Teenage Tracker Beta Version for yourself to see how good this app is and to get a bigger picture of what it can become with your support.

 

 

Click to jump to any section which interests you.

Status Updates

About this project

First Impression Video

Project Goal

Why crowd funding?

Why do we need your support?

Project Timeline

Use of funds

What happens with funds

What happens with ‘over target’ funds?

Whether you pledge or not

What we offer in return for your support

The Team

Our Locations

Introduction - What is Teenage Tracker & The Purpose of this App

First Presentation Video

How Teenage Tracker is Unique

Features

Minimal Requirements

Screenshots

Future Apps

Frequently Asked Questions

Contact Us

 

 

 

26.01.13

Teenage Tracker is currently in a full operational beta stage, so download it to your Android phone and try all the current features. Might be some problems and the app might crash occasionally. If you do experience a crash as a beta tester, please let us know so we can remedy the last outstanding bugs. We'd appreciate you downloading and start using it for free today.

 

 

Originally, Teenage Tracker was simply called “I Hear You”. We just wanted to access each other’s phones at any given moment. After first trials, using a cloud server system and Peer to Peer connectivity, we soon saw there was much more scope and scalability for complex operations. Thereby allowing creation of many different products from this base platform.

For the past 6 months, the platform on which Teenage Tracker is based has in fact been written, studied, and rewritten several times until it was deemed stable and scalable to at least a few hundred thousand active users. This may be a little obsessive for a start up, but it is the corner stone to our business model.

Our IndieGoGo campaign is not just about the Teenage Tracking App and making it a commercial product. It is mainly about our Platform and about being able to create useful P2P /social interactive applications.  As many as can be conceived. Imagine it as a conveyer belt of niche apps.

 

 

We asked random people for there opinion of the app.
This is 100% genuine, if you have any question for any of those people we would be glad to put you in touch.

 

 

The goal is to fulfill the contract with a company of Professional Beta Testers. This will help us to find problems that may still be within Teenage Tracker and the whole Platform. This is a crucial step in developing any successful app or software.

Marketing capital: To make Teenage Tracker and the following applications a commercial success. Without proper marketing and advertising, no one will ever know the product is out there.

 

 

There are many ways to raise capital, the most common ones are: Friends & Family, Bank loan or Private investors.
But every form of raising start up capital comes with its own set of drawbacks. Crowd funding is the newest and most outrageous of all concepts but it is beautiful at the same time. Indeed, contributions can be made with out asking for any perk at all but let’s face it not many can resist the temptation of a great deal.


And great deals they are, since they work both ways. Without the initial contributions, it would be a lot harder, if not impossible, to launch the product. Once the product is launched giving it out to our contributors comes at a negligible cost, and therefore everybody is happy. Meanwhile, let us examine our other options:-


Family and friends are a great source but for 99% or more of the global population (including us) our ideas, dreams and passions are even bigger than the combined resources of our extended families. Not to mention they probably have their own big ideas.


Banks are great but by far the most expensive route to take; placing unnecessary overhead upon the already limited cash flow. They are much less flexible and get heavy handed much quicker if things take that little bit longer than anticipated. Which is, in fact, just a part of life. If everything could always go to plan, financial risk would never be an issue.


Private investors are our second best option. Great venture capitalists take many factors into account. The presentation, the numbers and trust must all be in place in all the correct quantities to make a deal. This can be an extremely long drawn out process just finding such a wonderful person that just fits in with the vision, the team and most importantly is prepared to provide the funding.

Why Crowd Funding? Because it is by far, THE MOST COST EFFECTIVE FORM OF INVESTMENT for all concerned. Repayment is made in the form of our created intellectual property, which costs nothing extra to install on your phone, plus whatever level of perk was subscribed to if any was requested. Therefore, by paying everyone back in a non-monetary form, it means more of the financial capital is invested in our growth and none is allocated to high interest rates and balance repayments. There are some perks that will cost us a great deal but we have only promised those once we know we have a solid foundation to stand on.

 

 

Without your support, it will be really hard to get to the stage where PureApp Studio's Platform and Teenage Tracker can be bug & error free. We will not be able to deliver to all the people already believing in Teenage Tracker; actually waiting for the app to be there and start fully using all of its features.

We really ask for your consideration and help. As you can see we have the Teenage Tracker and the whole Platform there ready and set up in a Beta Stage. We have spent 6 months and over $15.000 in development. Have used all of our savings we had from previously working our day jobs. We now need your support as Beta Testing and Marketing does not come cheap!

We have the smallest budget possible out there. Some companies spend more than $250 - $500 thousand to develop and market a simple game.

What we are asking is for you to help us so we can contract beta testers and marketing companies. So we can finalize and commercialize not just one app but be able to use the same tools for many apps following right after Teenage Tracker.

 

* All dates are subjected to change, depending on the result of the Campaign

 

 

Beta Testing Company: This includes a special platform with bug and error reports, special functions for easier bug and error reporting and access to 60.000 Beta Testers.

Marketing Campaign: Includes PR Releases, Video Marketing, Radio Marketing, App Review Marketing, etc. The full list will be provided to all the Pledgers, once the project is successful.

Official Company Registration in Spain: PureApp Studio is the Name we have selected. To fully register a company in Spain needs a minimum of 3000 Euros as a basic capital of the company plus additional fees that apply when going through the whole registration procedure.

Perk's Budget: Looking though the list of our Perks, you will see there are some that are actually tangible. T-Shirts, Caps, Key Chains, Car Bumper Stickers and actual hard copy User's Manual, etc., that will have to be printed and posted by mail to different countries.

3rd Party Payment Processor & IndieGoGo Fees: Those are the standard fees required when our Campaign becomes successful.

 

 

Of course we hope this will not happen and we will reach our goal. However, if we do not to reach the goal, we will deliver all the Perks we have promised to our Pledgers. Because without you, we would not reach anything at all.

If there is a shortfall, we would create other campaigns to cover it by separating our targeted goals and will try to raise the funding separately. Here is a breakdown:

Beta Testing Company: This is our main goal, as without it Teenage Tracker and The Platform cannot be.

Marketing Campaign: Marketing is the second most important stage to deliver Teenage Tracker to the world.

 

 

In anticipation of receiving funding over our initial target, a contingency outline for future development would be given greater detail and brought forward in time.

Only when the funding is in place will we be able to detail our plans. At that stage we will inform everyone in regard to developments.

 

 

Whether you Pledge or not, you still can help in many different ways. Please come and help us; there are so many things you can do. Even if you have pledged and want to help us even more, here are the things you can do to give us a helping hand:

  • Spread the word about our IndieGoGo Project

Please share our IndieGoGo's page with all the tools they have offer.

  • Download Teenage Tracker BETA and play around with it

If you download and test our beta version and the app crashes, we will receive a basic report on what happened with the app and why it crashed. This way we will be able to locate that problem and fix it.

  • Visit our Facebook Pages
  • Visit our Twitter Pages
  • Visit our Websites

Share them with friends. Make comments or suggestions on them. Be part of the community. This will help us to grow faster and stronger.

 

All the Perks are transferable. Which means the more you support, the more you will receive in return for the time and support that you are giving Teenage Tracker and us. This means if you donate a larger sum of money, you will get everything under that amount.

For example, if you donate $100 you receive not only everything that Perk offers, you also get every Perk right down to the $10 offer too.

 Teenage Tracker App – Receive a fully functional Teenage Tracker App for the whole family for 2 years absolutely free of charge.
Name on the Website – We will place your business or personal name, together with a link of your choice, on our wall of fame on Teenage Tracker and PureApp Studio websites.
Name on Social Networks - We will place your business or personal name, together with a link of your choice on our Social Networks including Facebook, Twitter and further social accounts that we will open up in future.
Personalized Phone Background – We will send you a personalized phone background with Teenage Tracker Graphics, Your Name and a status that you have sponsored us.
Teenage Tracker Ringtone – We are creating a special Teenage Tracker that you can use for your phone or for the Alert Section that will be a feature in the App.
Baby Monitor App - Receive a fully functional Baby Monitor App for your baby and the whole family for 2 years absolutely free of charge.
Name on the 3rd Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 3rd Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.
Car Security App - Receive a fully functional Car Security App for 2 years absolutely free of charge.
Name on the 2nd Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 2nd Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.  
EXCLUSIVE – A $100 eGift Card/Voucher – Receive an eGift Card/Voucher once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 50.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.
All Future Apps – We have planned another 8 future apps to be released this year, and we will give them all to you absolutely free of charge.
Name on the 1st Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 1st Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.
Closed Community Access – We have a closed community for our sponsors, where you will be able to test our future apps, give your opinions, and suggest features and much, much more. You will receive a full access to our community.
Personal Thank You in Mail – You will receive a personal letter signed by all the team members of PureApp Studio right in your mailbox; no matter where in the world you are.
Hard Copy User Manual in Mail – You will receive a hard copy user manual, printed on a great quality paper and signed by all team members of PureApp Studio right in your mailbox; no matter where in the world you are.
Sponsor Gear – T-Shirt, Cap, Key Chain or Car Sticker – All equipped with Teenage Tracker Graphics. Vote which product; what color and what type of image would you like to have on the product. For more info visit: Teenage Tracker’s website.
EXCLUSIVE – Free Low End Android Phone – e.g. Samsung Galaxy Young. Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 100.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.
EXCLUSIVE – Free High Entry Level Android Phone – e.g. Samsung SIII Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 150.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.
Ad on Tracking Window on Teenage Tracker App – We will create a custom banner sizes for your ad to fit all phones and tablets and it will be located on a tracking screen on all distributed Teenage Tracker Apps for 2 years.
Mention on 2 of our PR Releases – We will mention you or your business (you tell us what to write) on 2 of our PR Releases. These releases are distributed by one of biggest PR agencies that we have contracted already.
Personal Thank You on Skype – One or more team members of PureApp Studio will actually call you on Skype and personally thank you for your time and support.        (This is optional)
Home Screen Ad on Teenage Tracker App - We will create a custom banner sizes for your ad to fit all phones and tablets and it will be located on a home screen on all distributed Teenage Tracker Apps for 2 years.
EXCLUSIVE – Holiday or Cash? – Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 200.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers You will receive a paid holiday of up to $8000 to any destination of your choice. With 1-5 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.
SUPER EXCLUSIVE – Personal App Creation – Would you like an Android app created for you with your specifications? Then this one is for you. In return for your support we will create your personal or business app. CLAUSE A Maximum of 1 Month will be allocated to each Pledger and on the first come – first served basis.

 

 

Nyhl Rawlings

 

Nyhl George Rawlings from Cape Town South Africa, moved to the south coast of spain in 1995 at the age of 10. He has always had a keen interest in technology and has acquired a wide range of skills from high and low software development through to hardware circuit design. His ambitions are to produce both hardware and software products that are interesting and usefull to everyone.

 
Anton Drobi

  

Originally from Russia, but moved to Germany at a young age with my family, later living in Spain, UK and back to Spain. Studied business & marketing, but always been fascinated by technology, graphics, web design and IM. Worked in real estate and other business where marketing was a necessity. With creation of PureApp Studio, feel that I am in a right place in a right time.

 
Ylber Lujkaj

 

Hey, I love art and have chosen the modern way to apply it and create something cool. I am a professional graphic-designer from a small country called Albania and I speak English & Italiano!  My preferences is something cute, warm and happy. Previously I’ve worked in Video Editing, VideoFX, Animation, Logo-Design, Vectors, UI and GUI design. Mostly I use Adobe Suite applications, like Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effects, etc. I also like to use 3D software that’s called Maxon Cinema 4D.

Although only 3 of us are constantly working on the project, many more people have been, or still are, working with us. All of them form a great part of the team here at PureApp Studio.

 

 



 

 

Teenage Tracker is a tool designed specially for parents. We know parents always worry about their children; especially so when they become teenagers and they develop the need to be out and about at all hours. The Teenage Tracker App is designed to help ease the worries of parents everywhere, by giving them the option to track their teenager's through their Smartphone. Monitoring your child's activities without disturbing their lives or annoying them. The application runs in the background of their Smartphone.

NOTICE:

It is strictly forbidden as stated within our terms and conditions to misuse this application, and may even be a legal infringement of your local law.

 

 

 


 

 

 

 

     

 

 

Mobile Baby Monitor App

Baby Monitor, is a mobile replacement to the old, annoying and outdated standard baby monitors that work on short-range radio, pick up weird sounds and must be constantly working. The new baby monitors offer video feed but also cost quite a lot and interfere with other equipment around the house. Our Mobile Baby Monitor will take care of all the problems and negatives that ordinary baby monitors have.

Quick features overview:

Video and Audio Monitoring

2-Way communication

Automated noise (cry) alert (no need to constantly listen to your child)

And many more

Panic Pad for Elderly Family Members App

Turn any phone into a panic pad for elderly family members. The phone can be easily configured to call another family member or directly to 911. The call can be activated, with tap on the screen, movement/shake, movement in front of camera, etc. Even if you get electricity cut, the phone will stay working and be available to make that emergency call that can save lives.

Mobile Car Alarm App

 Many of us have a car, which gets simple bumps and scratches. Unfortunately, sometimes people steal parts from our car from outside and sometimes break ins occur.

With our Mobile Car Alarm app, we can turn any phone into a great gadget which will give you extra security and piece of mind on what is going on with your car. By having an old phone in the car, you will be able to get a buzz on your personal phone every time the car is slightly bumped or moved. It will give you a buzz and you can activate the phones microphone and camera, record the live feed and if, heaven forbid, the car is stolen, you can track it on Google maps. 

 

 

•   How does the app work?

All you have to do is to install it on your phone and your child’s phone. After that, simply pair both devices with your personal phone id and pin set. Then you are ready to go. It is simple as that.

•   Is this app legal?

As long as the parent has the legal custody of a child or has permission from the person who holds the phone, it is totally legal to use the app. In the UK, then you also need the child’s permission in writing even if you are the legal parent or guardian of the child.  If any of those conditions are not met, then is the person who is monitoring the remote, is who is breaking the law, not the app.

•   Who is responsible if the app will fail to work?

We will immediately attempt to resolve the issue in a shortest time possible if the problem persists, please read our refund policy.

•   Can I use the app in a different way other than tracking teenagers?

Provided that your actions are deemed both moral and legal under the jurisdiction of which you reside, then you can do whatever you please. Be advised that we take no responsibility for your actions.

•   Is it possible to hide the app, so my child will not know that it is there?

No! This is neither moral nor ethical. We do not plan to implement this feature at any time. Please do not request it!

•   How much will the app cost?

Once the app is commercially released, please visit Google Play Store of your country and it will tell you.

•   Is there any similar app to Teenage Tracker?

At the time of writing this documentation, to our knowledge, there is nothing that offers the same level of flexibility and set of features that are offered by Teenage Tracker.

•   Will Teenage Tracker be available for iPhone?

We are considering a release for an iPhoneowever, this is subject to a level of commercial success on the Android Platform.

•   Can the app be used if my child is in a different country?

Wherever you and your child have an Internet access the system will work, regardless the distance between you and your child. Features are planned in future versions that allow some degree of connectivity where Internet access is limited.

•   Can this app be considered as intrusion into private life?

This is subjected to your community’s moral values. However, in most countries it is not considered intrusive if the person that is being monitored is under your legal custody or you have explicit permission from that person.

•   Who is responsible for the misuse of Teenage Tracker app?

As with any computer software product, under the Computers Misuse Act and similar laws in other countries, you are obliged to have permission to access any remote system. And therefore the previous conditions mentioned before: “The person who owns the phone that is going to be tracked is under your legal custody or you have explicit permission to track their phone” are applied.

•   What can I do if my child has turned off/uninstalled the app?

This is a family matter for you to deal as seen appropriately.

•   Can I be legally penalized for tracking my child?

In all known jurisdictions to us, if you have legal custody and/or explicit permission, the answer is no. However, you are encouraged to consult your local laws on that matter.

•   How many minutes of conversation can I record from my child’s phone?

 It depends on the memory capacity that your phone has.

•   How can I know what my child is doing if the phone is in his pocket?

The video feed will not be useful in this case as the clothing will obstruct cameras. However, you can still use audio, GPS tracking and movement sensors.

•   Will you provide updates for Teenage Tracker?

Of course we will! This is standard practice with all software products.

•   Do you collect data from our cell phones?

Not in the slightest! The only information we have on record is the email address associated with your handset.

•   Do you offer tech support?

Currently no, as Teenage Tracker is in Beta Stage, but once the app is commercially released, we will have a ticketing system set up to help you with any issue you may encounter with Teenage Tracker.

•   How does Teenage Tracker pinpoint’s my child’s location?

Using the phones built in GPS location services.

•   Can my son/daughter discover that Teenage Tracker is on their phone?

Yes! We do not hide the presence of the app on the phone. It is important to us to be considered an ethical company.

•   Can anybody else monitor my child phone?

No. Not even we can do that, as we do not collect or store the login credentials.

 


We have made communication with us as easy as possible, so you can contact with us at any time you want. 

You can contact us in the following ways:

Here on IndieGoGo, just use the comments section.

 

Teenage Tracker’s Website: http://teenagetracker.net

PureApp Studio’s Facebook Page: http://www.facebook.com/PureAppStudio

PureApp Studio’s Twitter Page: http://twitter.com/PureAppStudio

 

On our websites, there are contact forms and we actually setting up a Ticketing System, so it will be easier for us to manage your questions, requests, suggestions and simple communications between us.

FINAL NOTICE:
Unfortunately, our IndiGoGo campaign has failed, but our App has not! So please visit our website: http://teenagetracker.net or Google Play Store and try our app.
 



We would love you to try Teenage Tracker Beta Version for yourself to see how good this app is and to get a bigger picture of what it can become with your support.

26.01.13
Teenage Tracker is currently in a full operational beta stage, so download it to your Android phone and try all the current features. Might be some problems and the app might crash occasionally. If you do experience a crash as a beta tester, please let us know so we can remedy the last outstanding bugs. We'd appreciate you downloading and start using it for free today.
 


 
Originally, Teenage Tracker was simply called “I Hear You”. We just wanted to access each other’s phones at any given moment. After first trials, using a cloud server system and Peer to Peer connectivity, we soon saw there was much more scope and scalability for complex operations. Thereby allowing creation of many different products from this base platform.
For the past 6 months, the platform on which Teenage Tracker is based has in fact been written, studied, and rewritten several times until it was deemed stable and scalable to at least a few hundred thousand active users. This may be a little obsessive for a start up, but it is the corner stone to our business model.
Our IndieGoGo campaign is not just about the Teenage Tracking App and making it a commercial product. It is mainly about our Platform and about being able to create useful P2P /social interactive applications.  As many as can be conceived. Imagine it as a conveyer belt of niche apps.
 


 

We asked random people for there opinion of the app. This is 100% genuine, if you have any question for any of those people we would be glad to put you in touch.
 


 
The goal is to fulfill the contract with a company of Professional Beta Testers. This will help us to find problems that may still be within Teenage Tracker and the whole Platform. This is a crucial step in developing any successful app or software.
Marketing capital: To make Teenage Tracker and the following applications a commercial success. Without proper marketing and advertising, no one will ever know the product is out there.
 


 
There are many ways to raise capital, the most common ones are: Friends & Family, Bank loan or Private investors. But every form of raising start up capital comes with its own set of drawbacks. Crowd funding is the newest and most outrageous of all concepts but it is beautiful at the same time. Indeed, contributions can be made with out asking for any perk at all but let’s face it not many can resist the temptation of a great deal.
 And great deals they are, since they work both ways. Without the initial contributions, it would be a lot harder, if not impossible, to launch the product. Once the product is launched giving it out to our contributors comes at a negligible cost, and therefore everybody is happy. Meanwhile, let us examine our other options:-
 Family and friends are a great source but for 99% or more of the global population (including us) our ideas, dreams and passions are even bigger than the combined resources of our extended families. Not to mention they probably have their own big ideas.
 Banks are great but by far the most expensive route to take; placing unnecessary overhead upon the already limited cash flow. They are much less flexible and get heavy handed much quicker if things take that little bit longer than anticipated. Which is, in fact, just a part of life. If everything could always go to plan, financial risk would never be an issue.
 Private investors are our second best option. Great venture capitalists take many factors into account. The presentation, the numbers and trust must all be in place in all the correct quantities to make a deal. This can be an extremely long drawn out process just finding such a wonderful person that just fits in with the vision, the team and most importantly is prepared to provide the funding.

Why Crowd Funding? Because it is by far, THE MOST COST EFFECTIVE FORM OF INVESTMENT for all concerned. Repayment is made in the form of our created intellectual property, which costs nothing extra to install on your phone, plus whatever level of perk was subscribed to if any was requested. Therefore, by paying everyone back in a non-monetary form, it means more of the financial capital is invested in our growth and none is allocated to high interest rates and balance repayments. There are some perks that will cost us a great deal but we have only promised those once we know we have a solid foundation to stand on.
 


 
Without your support, it will be really hard to get to the stage where PureApp Studio's Platform and Teenage Tracker can be bug & error free. We will not be able to deliver to all the people already believing in Teenage Tracker; actually waiting for the app to be there and start fully using all of its features.

We really ask for your consideration and help. As you can see we have the Teenage Tracker and the whole Platform there ready and set up in a Beta Stage. We have spent 6 months and over $15.000 in development. Have used all of our savings we had from previously working our day jobs. We now need your support as Beta Testing and Marketing does not come cheap!
We have the smallest budget possible out there. Some companies spend more than $250 - $500 thousand to develop and market a simple game.
What we are asking is for you to help us so we can contract beta testers and marketing companies. So we can finalize and commercialize not just one app but be able to use the same tools for many apps following right after Teenage Tracker.
 



* All dates are subjected to change, depending on the result of the Campaign
 


 

Beta Testing Company: This includes a special platform with bug and error reports, special functions for easier bug and error reporting and access to 60.000 Beta Testers.
Marketing Campaign: Includes PR Releases, Video Marketing, Radio Marketing, App Review Marketing, etc. The full list will be provided to all the Pledgers, once the project is successful.
Official Company Registration in Spain: PureApp Studio is the Name we have selected. To fully register a company in Spain needs a minimum of 3000 Euros as a basic capital of the company plus additional fees that apply when going through the whole registration procedure.
Perk's Budget: Looking though the list of our Perks, you will see there are some that are actually tangible. T-Shirts, Caps, Key Chains, Car Bumper Stickers and actual hard copy User's Manual, etc., that will have to be printed and posted by mail to different countries.
3rd Party Payment Processor & IndieGoGo Fees: Those are the standard fees required when our Campaign becomes successful.
 


 
Of course we hope this will not happen and we will reach our goal. However, if we do not to reach the goal, we will deliver all the Perks we have promised to our Pledgers. Because without you, we would not reach anything at all.
If there is a shortfall, we would create other campaigns to cover it by separating our targeted goals and will try to raise the funding separately. Here is a breakdown:

Beta Testing Company: This is our main goal, as without it Teenage Tracker and The Platform cannot be.
Marketing Campaign: Marketing is the second most important stage to deliver Teenage Tracker to the world.
 


 
In anticipation of receiving funding over our initial target, a contingency outline for future development would be given greater detail and brought forward in time.
Only when the funding is in place will we be able to detail our plans. At that stage we will inform everyone in regard to developments.
 


 
Whether you Pledge or not, you still can help in many different ways. Please come and help us; there are so many things you can do. Even if you have pledged and want to help us even more, here are the things you can do to give us a helping hand:

Spread the word about our IndieGoGo Project
Please share our IndieGoGo's page with all the tools they have offer.

Download Teenage Tracker BETA and play around with it
If you download and test our beta version and the app crashes, we will receive a basic report on what happened with the app and why it crashed. This way we will be able to locate that problem and fix it.

Visit our Facebook Pages
Visit our Twitter Pages
Visit our Websites
Share them with friends. Make comments or suggestions on them. Be part of the community. This will help us to grow faster and stronger.
 



All the Perks are transferable. Which means the more you support, the more you will receive in return for the time and support that you are giving Teenage Tracker and us. This means if you donate a larger sum of money, you will get everything under that amount.
For example, if you donate $100 you receive not only everything that Perk offers, you also get every Perk right down to the $10 offer too.






Teenage Tracker App – Receive a fully functional Teenage Tracker App for the whole family for 2 years absolutely free of charge.






Name on the Website – We will place your business or personal name, together with a link of your choice, on our wall of fame on Teenage Tracker and PureApp Studio websites.






Name on Social Networks - We will place your business or personal name, together with a link of your choice on our Social Networks including Facebook, Twitter and further social accounts that we will open up in future.






Personalized Phone Background – We will send you a personalized phone background with Teenage Tracker Graphics, Your Name and a status that you have sponsored us.






Teenage Tracker Ringtone – We are creating a special Teenage Tracker that you can use for your phone or for the Alert Section that will be a feature in the App.






Baby Monitor App - Receive a fully functional Baby Monitor App for your baby and the whole family for 2 years absolutely free of charge.






Name on the 3rd Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 3rd Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.






Car Security App - Receive a fully functional Car Security App for 2 years absolutely free of charge.






Name on the 2nd Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 2nd Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.  







EXCLUSIVE – A $100 eGift Card/Voucher – Receive an eGift Card/Voucher once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 50.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.






All Future Apps – We have planned another 8 future apps to be released this year, and we will give them all to you absolutely free of charge.






Name on the 1st Page of Sponsor List – Thousands of people will be using Teenage Tracker and your business or personal name together with a link of your choice will be on the 1st Page of Sponsor List right in Teenage Tracker App.






Closed Community Access – We have a closed community for our sponsors, where you will be able to test our future apps, give your opinions, and suggest features and much, much more. You will receive a full access to our community.






Personal Thank You in Mail – You will receive a personal letter signed by all the team members of PureApp Studio right in your mailbox; no matter where in the world you are.






Hard Copy User Manual in Mail – You will receive a hard copy user manual, printed on a great quality paper and signed by all team members of PureApp Studio right in your mailbox; no matter where in the world you are.






Sponsor Gear – T-Shirt, Cap, Key Chain or Car Sticker – All equipped with Teenage Tracker Graphics. Vote which product; what color and what type of image would you like to have on the product. For more info visit: Teenage Tracker’s website.






EXCLUSIVE – Free Low End Android Phone – e.g. Samsung Galaxy Young. Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 100.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.






EXCLUSIVE – Free High Entry Level Android Phone – e.g. Samsung SIII Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 150.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers. With 1-3 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.






Ad on Tracking Window on Teenage Tracker App – We will create a custom banner sizes for your ad to fit all phones and tablets and it will be located on a tracking screen on all distributed Teenage Tracker Apps for 2 years.






Mention on 2 of our PR Releases – We will mention you or your business (you tell us what to write) on 2 of our PR Releases. These releases are distributed by one of biggest PR agencies that we have contracted already.






Personal Thank You on Skype – One or more team members of PureApp Studio will actually call you on Skype and personally thank you for your time and support.        (This is optional)






Home Screen Ad on Teenage Tracker App - We will create a custom banner sizes for your ad to fit all phones and tablets and it will be located on a home screen on all distributed Teenage Tracker Apps for 2 years.






EXCLUSIVE – Holiday or Cash? – Once amongst all PureApp Studio’s products reach a 200.000 past and present paid purchases and/or subscribers You will receive a paid holiday of up to $8000 to any destination of your choice. With 1-5 apps it’s very possible to achieve in a short period of time.






SUPER EXCLUSIVE – Personal App Creation – Would you like an Android app created for you with your specifications? Then this one is for you. In return for your support we will create your personal or business app. CLAUSE A Maximum of 1 Month will be allocated to each Pledger and on the first come – first served basis.

 


 
Nyhl Rawlings

 
Nyhl George Rawlings from Cape Town South Africa, moved to the south coast of spain in 1995 at the age of 10. He has always had a keen interest in technology and has acquired a wide range of skills from high and low software development through to hardware circuit design. His ambitions are to produce both hardware and software products that are interesting and usefull to everyone.
 Anton Drobi


  
Originally from Russia, but moved to Germany at a young age with my family, later living in Spain, UK and back to Spain. Studied business & marketing, but always been fascinated by technology, graphics, web design and IM. Worked in real estate and other business where marketing was a necessity. With creation of PureApp Studio, feel that I am in a right place in a right time.
 Ylber Lujkaj

story:
We sweat. We want to give up. We think we will never make it through to the end of class. We hate the thought of doing one more drill. Everything seems hard to us. We smile. We laugh. We perservere. We learn. We excel. We learn to love the pride we feel in the skills we've earned with our own toil.

Our class makes us strong, fast, and agile. We learn and practice the arts of fencing, boxing, and wrestling. We develop an art for ourselves, born from the written legacy of our warrior ancestors. Our hands know the feel of swords, and we know the joy of testing ourselves against each other, and forging skill together.
 
Update Nov. 30:  Wow!  Seven days left in our official fundraising campaign, three days before we need the funds, we’ve hit…and exceeded…our goal of raising half the fund we need for a years worth of insurance. Now we’re into the stretch goal, and starting to think about covering all the insurance, and getting some more loaner gear for students. I’m feeling a little overwhelmed…you folks are showing some serious support. Thank you!
                     -David

Who We Are

David R. Packer is the genius martial arts mastermind behind Valkyrie and the Box Wrestle Fence training system. He has been doing martial arts since 1980, and discovered Western martial arts and the joys of swordplay a couple of decades later. In 2004, he founded Academie Duello with Devon Boorman. After leaving the Academie and after many false starts, he developed the ultimate martial training system.
 
Box Wrestle Fence encompasses the three essentials of martial arts: striking, grappling, and hand-held weapons.  The body must be able to perform extreme tasks of strength, agility, balance and endurance. A complete martial art is a lifestyle. Everything is fuelled by correct nutrition. Learning should be through challenge and test more than lecture and demonstration.
 
To learn more about the Box Wrestle Fence system and his thoughts on many other subjects, visit the blog at www.boxwrestlefence.com.
 
Courtney Rice is the original Valkyrie. She was the first women to attain Red Cord rank at Academie Duello, and took to longsword training with even more fervor. She has a well-deserved reputation as a fearsome wrestler with a killer guillotine, and really loves the sheer athleticism of the martial arts lifestyle.
 
Outside of training time, she's a graduate of Emily Carr University of Art and Design and the famed Capilano College Fiber Arts program. She can spin fibers into yarn, weave yarn into cloth, dye the cloth using natural dyes, and cut and sew that cloth into a lovely jacket. Or knit you some awesome gloves if you ask nice.
 
As if a sharp eye for design and the ability to break men's backs weren't enough, she also has a keen mind for business, which is why she handles all the things about running a school that actually require work, as opposed to yelling. David does the yelling. He's good at that. (Courtney can yell too, when pressed. Her mother's an opera singer.)

The Opportunity

David has been teaching small, outdoor classes for about a year and a half. After a lot of fruitless searching, a fantastic new indoor location (One Thousand Rivers Academy of Arts and Learning) has fallen into our laps, with space available two nights per week beginning December 3rd.
 
In order to start, we need to get a few things in place first. Liability insurance, which unfortunately requires many dollars up front, is the big one. We also need some basic training gear and loaner equipment.
 

What We Need

Our fundraising goal is $750.  This will cover about half of the insurance costs. If we raise more than our goal, it will go first towards the other half of the insurance. Any further remainder will be used to purchase equipment - focus mitts, wrestling mats, loaner weapons, etc.

Since this is a flexible funding campaign, if we don't meet our entire goal we'll still receive all the donations, every penny of which will still go towards the insurance.

What You Get

As for what you get, you've probably already browsed the list of perks. Firstly, and most importantly, you'll be toasted at length when we celebrate after class # 1 (assuming anybody attending can stand well enough to get to a pub afterwards).

Secondly, and we're very excited about this one, we will dedicate a round of sparring to you or the cause of your choice. If you've always wanted to see somebody get in a swordfight in the name of zombie rights, or wrestle to prove that kittens are cuter than puppies, now is your chance.

Thirdly, you can gain eternal fame (at least for as long as a rubber training knife lasts) with your name or a phrase of your choice permanantly engraved on the blade.

Fourth, we have designed a special, limited edition Box Wrestle Fence athletic t-shirt that will only be available to our Indiegogo supporters. You'll get a similar one with the purchase of a membership, but two t-shirts is the only way to avoid mid-week laundry if you're going to attend two classes a week!

Lastly, the two membership specials include a free membership, classes, and private sessions with David at the location of your choice to either tune up some rusty skills, or for personalized fitness or nutrition training.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share!  Tell people about the campaign, the classes, or both. Classes are always more fun with more people around, and we're hoping to kick-start the community feeling with this fundraiser.  Class information can be found at www.boxwrestlefence.com/valkyrie.
 
Donate!  If you don't have an extra ten bucks but have an underused set of boxing gloves, focus mitts, a kicking shield, a training rapier, longsword, or anything else we might be able to use, send us an e-mail with the details, we'll likely be more than happy to accept it.
story_txt:
We sweat. We want to give up. We think we will never make it through to the end of class. We hate the thought of doing one more drill. Everything seems hard to us. We smile. We laugh. We perservere. We learn. We excel. We learn to love the pride we feel in the skills we've earned with our own toil.Our class makes us strong, fast, and agile. We learn and practice the arts of fencing, boxing, and wrestling. We develop an art for ourselves, born from the written legacy of our warrior ancestors. Our hands know the feel of swords, and we know the joy of testing ourselves against each other, and forging skill together.
 

Update Nov. 30:  Wow!  Seven days left in our official fundraising campaign, three days before we need the funds, we’ve hit…and exceeded…our goal of raising half the fund we need for a years worth of insurance. Now we’re into the stretch goal, and starting to think about covering all the insurance, and getting some more loaner gear for students. I’m feeling a little overwhelmed…you folks are showing some serious support. Thank you!
                     -David
Who We Are

David R. Packer is the genius martial arts mastermind behind Valkyrie and the Box Wrestle Fence training system. He has been doing martial arts since 1980, and discovered Western martial arts and the joys of swordplay a couple of decades later. In 2004, he founded Academie Duello with Devon Boorman. After leaving the Academie and after many false starts, he developed the ultimate martial training system.
 
Box Wrestle Fence encompasses the three essentials of martial arts: striking, grappling, and hand-held weapons.  The body must be able to perform extreme tasks of strength, agility, balance and endurance. A complete martial art is a lifestyle. Everything is fuelled by correct nutrition. Learning should be through challenge and test more than lecture and demonstration.
 
To learn more about the Box Wrestle Fence system and his thoughts on many other subjects, visit the blog at www.boxwrestlefence.com.
 

Courtney Rice is the original Valkyrie. She was the first women to attain Red Cord rank at Academie Duello, and took to longsword training with even more fervor. She has a well-deserved reputation as a fearsome wrestler with a killer guillotine, and really loves the sheer athleticism of the martial arts lifestyle.
 
Outside of training time, she's a graduate of Emily Carr University of Art and Design and the famed Capilano College Fiber Arts program. She can spin fibers into yarn, weave yarn into cloth, dye the cloth using natural dyes, and cut and sew that cloth into a lovely jacket. Or knit you some awesome gloves if you ask nice.
 
As if a sharp eye for design and the ability to break men's backs weren't enough, she also has a keen mind for business, which is why she handles all the things about running a school that actually require work, as opposed to yelling. Secondly, and we're very excited about this one, we will dedicate a round of sparring to you or the cause of your choice. If you've always wanted to see somebody get in a swordfight in the name of zombie rights, or wrestle to prove that kittens are cuter than puppies, now is your chance.

Lastly, the two membership specials include a free membership, classes, and private sessions with David at the location of your choice to either tune up some rusty skills, or for personalized fitness or nutrition training.

story:
During some poolside hijinx in 1960s Toledo, a pre-teen Diane S. bumped her front tooth. It didn't seem like a big deal at the time but the tooth's root died on the spot. Its casing lived on, and for the last 50 years it's played a starring role in the smile and laugh we've grown to know and love. But after a long run Diane needs a dental implant. It costs $6K... an amount that's not insured or financially do-able for Lady Di right now.  

This is where you come in. Be a tooth fairy and help her out. Donate what you can... but keep in mind that donations of $100, $200, and up are what will make a dent in her dental $ needs. Think of it as a gift to your friend, one that will keep on giving for years to come. All she want(ed) for Christmas is her one front tooth...

story:
Short Summary

The mission of the Delaware Breast Cancer Coalition (DBCC), Inc. is to empower our community by raising awareness of breast health issues through outreach, education and support services, in order to facilitate the early detection and treatment of breast cancer. To better reach our mission, DBCC has come up with innovative ways to educated women about breast health, breast cancer and resources for screening.


Mommy & Me, Grand Mom Makes 3 Pink Tea is a breast health tea party for women and girls of all ages hosted by the Delaware Breast Cancer Coalition (DBCC) in partnership with many youth based organizations. This tea party teaches women about breast cancer and resources for mammography, and also teaches youth about normal breast development. With all the marketing happening around breast cancer, many youth are being introduced to the idea of breast cancer well before they have an understanding of normal breast changes. This breast cancer awareness marketing is leaving many young girls afraid that they are developing the disease, when really, their breast are going through their normal changes. Through this program, DBCC aims to connect under-insured/uninsured women to mammography screenings through Screening For Life and our Mobil Mammography Van, as well as alleviate the fear that young girls have of getting breast cancer.


What We Need

The Delaware Breast Cancer Coalition would really like to raise $2000. This money would cover the cost of multiple Mommy & Me, Grand Mom Makes 3 Pink Tea programs, by covering the cost of supplies including:

  • Food
  • Eating utensils and plates
  • Plastic cup and plastic tea cups
  • Table cloths
  • Paper, markers, glues, etc for youth activities

We would really like to take this program all over the state of Delaware to as many youth organizations as possible, but we need the funds to do it.


The Impact

DBCC recognizes the importance of "generational" education when it comes to breast cancer- the Mommy and Me program is one step toward achieving that goal. Through this program, DBCC aims to connect under-insured/uninsured women to mammography screenings through Screening For Life and our Mobil Mammography Van, as well as alleviate the fear that young girls have of getting breast cancer.

DBCC will know that the program is a success when we are able to navigate at least 10% of women met through the program to mammography screenings. In addition, positive feedback from the youth demonstrating their understanding of normal breast development will also be an indicator of success.

The Mommy & Me, Grand Mom Makes 3 Pink Tea is a model that can also be shared with communities beyond Delaware. This model could be utilized for other healthcare forums as well.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please help the Delaware Breast Cancer Coalition in the fight against breast cancer by spreading the word about our program. It's easy, you can use the Indiegogo share tools!

If you are an employee at a youth based organization and would like to host a Mommy & Me, Grand Mom Makes 3 Pink Tea at your location, please contact Chadeia Mitchell at cmitchell@debreastcancer.org or call 302-778-1102 ext. 18.

story:
English Version


Summary

This year we celebrate the 545th anniversary of the Lipnic Battle, where Ștefan cel Mare, the illustrious ruler of Moldova, defeated the Tatar invaders. This is the only battle of Ștefan cel Mare that took place on the territory which is today part of the Republic of Moldova.

According to the tradition, the battle began from Fântâna Cadânei ("The Well of the Odalisque"). The legend says that the name of the well comes from a beautiful girl who, being chased by a Turk seeking to take her to his harem, jumped into a well located near Lipnic.

The well dates back before the Lipnic Battle (thus, it is at least from the XV century). It was rebuilt several times, while in 1970 it received the status of protected monument. The most recent renovation of the well took place in 1989.

Since Fântâna Cadânei is currently in a deplorable condition, we decided to restore it.

The draft project for the rehabilitation of Fântâna Cadânei and of the neighbouring area was initially submitted for the discussions with the Nationa Council of Historic Monuments at the end of May 2014. At that moment, the Council reverted with certain recommendations in order to observe the authenticity requirements of the site. We took these recommendations into consideration, so that in July 2014, the project in an adjusted form was re-submitted with the Council receiving the approval (the approval document of 14 July 2014 is available on this page).


The Impact

The project aims to:

·  create a unique historical place that brings closer to the people the spirit of the place and the values of the country.

·  arrange a historical landscape by restoring the existing well according to the authenticity requirements..

·  promote the well as part of the touristic route of the area, which also includes, amongst others, windmills, watermills, wooden churches, boyar mansions, house museums and natural landscapes..

·  give an example of rehabilitation of monuments, as the monuments in the Republic of Moldova are in a continuous degradation.

·  offer the possibility for the community to get involved.

·  sensitize the public with respect to the problem of degradation of protected monuments. 


What We Need

The total value of the project is estimated not to exceed EUR 5000. A part of this amount (USD 4000) is collected through this platform. You may also contribute by transferring the amounts to the bank accounts mentioned at the bottom of this text.

In any case, the project is the type of initiative that, beyond financial contribution, requires active implication of different people in the effective implementation thereof.. 

Both the financial contribution that the project needs and active involvement of different people are strong success factors that will ensure the continuity of this project and hopefully will have effects upon our society.


Romanian Version


Rezumat

În acest an, aniversăm 545 de ani de la bătălia de la Lipnic, unde Ștefan cel Mare, ilustrul domnitor al Moldovei, i-a înfrânt pe invadatorii tătari. Este singura bătălie a lui Ștefan cel Mare care a avut loc pe teritoriul actual al Republicii Moldova.

Potrivit tradiției, lupta a început de la Fântâna Cadânei. Legenda spune că numele fântânei vine de la o fată frumoasă care, fiind urmărită de un turc ce încerca s-o ducă în haremul său, a sărit într-o fântână de lângă Lipnic.

Fântâna datează încă dinaintea bătăliei de la Lipnic (fiind, astfel, cel puțin din secolul XV). A fost reconstruită de câteva ori, iar în 1970 capătă statutul de monument protejat. Ultima renovare a fântânii s-a realizat în 1989.

Având în vedere că Fântâna Cadânei este în prezent într-o stare deplorabilă, am decis s-o restaurăm.

Schița de proiect pentru reabilitarea Fântânii Cadânei și a zonei adiacente a fost inițial supusă dezbaterii Consiliul Național al Monumentelor Istorice la sfârșitul lunii mai 2014. La acel moment, Consiliul a venit cu anumite recomandări pentru a se respecta cerințele de autenticitate ale amplasamentului. Am ținut cont de aceste recomandări, astfel că în iulie 2014, proiectul în forma ajustată a fost redepus la Consiliu, primind avizul pozitiv (fișa de avizare din 14 iulie 2014 este disponibilă pe această pagină).

Impactul

Proiectul urmărește:

·  să creeze o destinație istorică unică în măsură să aducă mai aproape spiritul locului și valorile naționale.

·  să restaureze fântâna existentă potrivit cerințelor de autenticitate.

·  să promoveze fântâna ca parte a circuitului turistic în zonă, care de asemenea include, printre altele, mori de vânt, mori de apă, biserici din lemn, conace boierești, case-muzeu și peisaje naturale.

·  să dea un exemplu de reabilitare a monumentelor, având în vedere că monumentele în Republica Moldova sunt într-o stare de permanentă degradare.

·  să ofere posibilitatea comunității de a se implica.

·  să sensibilizeze publicul cu privire la problema degradării monumentelor protejate.

De ce avem nevoie

Estimarea este că valoarea totală a proiectului nu va depăşi 5000 de euro. O parte din aceşti bani (4000 dolari) sunt colectaţi prin intermediul acestei platforme. De asemenea, puteţi contribui virând banii direct în conturile bancare indicate la sfârşitul acestui text.

În orice caz, proiectul este o inițiativă care, pe lângă contribuția financiară, necesită o implicare activă în vederea implementării acesteia.

Atât contribuția financiară de care este nevoie cât și implicarea persoanelor sunt factori care vor asigura continuitatea acestui proiect și, sperăm, vor avea un impact social.

Banking details / Rechizitele bancare
For payments in euro / Pentru plăţi în euro
Intermediary bank / Banca intermediară: Commerzbank AG, Frankfurt am Main, Germania SWIFT Code / Cod SWIFT: COBADEFF Bank of beneficiary / Banca beneficiarului: Banca Comercială ,,EXIMBANK – Gruppo Veneto Banca SA”, Chişinău, Moldova, SWIFT Code / Codul SWIFT: EXMM MD22 Account of beneficiary / Contul beneficarului (IBAN): MD50EX1100002251139729EU Name of beneficiary / Numele beneficiarului: Asociaţia Obştească Comitetul Naţional ICOM Moldova 
For payments in USD / Pentru plăţi în dolari:
Intermediary bank / Banca intermediară: The Bank of New York Mellon., New York, USA SWIFT Code / Cod SWIFT: IRVTUS3N,  Bank of beneficiary / Banca beneficiarului: Banca Comercială ,,EXIMBANK – Gruppo Veneto Banca SA”, Chişinău, Moldova,  SWIFT Code / Codul SWIFT: EXMM MD22,  Account of beneficiary / Contul beneficarului (IBAN): MD69EX1100002251139729US Name of beneficiary / Numele beneficiarului: Asociaţia Obştească Comitetul Naţional ICOM Moldova 
For payments in lei / Pentru plăţi în lei: 
Account of beneficiary / Contul beneficiarului: 2251139729MD BIC: EXMMMD22436 Bank of beneficiary / Banca beneficiarului: Banca Comercială ,,EXIMBANK – Gruppo Veneto Banca SA”, Chişinău, Moldova, Name of beneficiary / Numele beneficiarului: Asociaţia Obştească Comitetul Naţional ICOM Moldova
